mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_RETRUN_PROD_INFO( id, return_code, launch_user_id, return_type, status, remark, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{returnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{launchUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{returnType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

INSERT INTO T_RETRUN_PROD_INFO( id, return_code, launch_user_id, return_type, status, remark, create_time, update_time ) VALUES
( #{tRetrunProdInfo.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tRetrunProdInfo.returnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tRetrunProdInfo.launchUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tRetrunProdInfo.returnType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tRetrunProdInfo.status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tRetrunProdInfo.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tRetrunProdInfo.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tRetrunProdInfo.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_RETRUN_PROD_INFO SET id = #{id}, return_code = #{returnCode}, launch_user_id = #{launchUserId}, return_type = #{returnType}, status = #{status}, remark = #{remark}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
